content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: composter
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 37}]

thought: To craft a composter, I need to craft crimson_slab first. Crimson_slab can be crafted by placing 3 crimson_planks in the first row of the crafting grid. I will first move one of the crimson_planks from slot 16 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: composter
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 37}]
thought: Since there is already one crimson_planks in the crafting grid, I will move another one to the right of it.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: composter
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 37}]
thought: Since there are already two crimson_planks in the crafting grid, I will move the last one to the right of them.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: composter
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 37}]
thought: Since there are already three crimson_planks in the crafting grid, I can craft the crimson_slab. I will move the crafted crimson_slab to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6

TASK: Craft an item of type: composter
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 37}]

Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
